paragraphs.text: One body language change she recommends you try making is the classicWonder Woman pose with your arms out and posed on your hips. By standing like a superhero, you won’t only feel like one, but people will think you’re a Wonder (Wo)man and have their attention glued to you.

paragraphs.text: Thank you so much for sharing this Elle Kaplan. I have read about some of the techniques mentioned, like the wonder woman pose and others, but for me nothing has worked better than remaining mindful in such situations. Mindfulness gives you a centeredness that I can not replicate through other means. The thing is, it takes practice!
